isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - ENGINE COVER

svcsubproc.title: Install Engine Cover on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 96
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide engine cover (Item 2) in place under the dash panel.
Install two hex head sems bolts (Item 5) into passenger side of engine cover. Tighten to 53 to 71 Lbf-in (6 to 8 N•m).
Install two hex head sems bolts (Item 4) across the front of engine cover. Tighten to 53 to 71 Lbf-in (6 to 8 N•m).
Install two hex head sems bolts (Item 3) into driver side of engine cover. Tighten to 53 to 71 Lbf-in (6 to 8 N•m).
Install two hex head sems bolts (Item 1) at the top of engine cover (Item 2). Tighten to 53 to 71 Lbf-in (6 to 8 N•m).
Install floor mat into daycab or front floor mat into sleeper cab.

Install passenger and driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

Install passenger air bucket seat or fixed passenger seat, and driver air bucket seat on daycab, refer to
SEATS
. For installing passenger air bucket seat, refer to Install Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Daycab. For installing fixed passenger seat, refer to Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Daycab. For installing driver air bucket seat, refer to Install Driver Air Bucket Seat on Daycab.

Install passenger air bucket seat or fixed passenger seat, and driver air bucket seat on sleeper cab, refer to
SEATS
. For installing passenger air bucket seat, refer to Install Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Sleeper Cab. For installing fixed passenger seat, refer to Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Sleeper Cab. For installing driver air bucket seat, refer to Install Driver Air Bucket Seat on Sleeper Cab.
